shortdesc.ph: Sets the playback position of the music file.
Sets the playback position of the music file.
Sets the playback position of the music file.
Sets the playback position of the music file.

section.p: This method allows you to set the playback position of the audio file, so you can play the file from a specific position instead of from the beginning.
This method sets the playback position of an audio file, allowing you to play from a specific point instead of from the beginning.
This method sets the playback position of the audio file, allowing you to play the file based on actual needs instead of playing it from start to finish.
This method sets the playback position of the audio file so that you can play it from a specific point instead of from the beginning.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You need to call this method after and receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You must call this method after and after receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(AudioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You must call this method after and after receiving the onAudioMixingStateChanged(audioMixingStatePlaying) callback.
You need to call this method after and after receiving the OnAudioMixingStateChanged(AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.

plentry.pd: Integer. The position of the progress bar in milliseconds.
An integer. The position in the progress bar, in milliseconds.
Integer. The position on the progress bar, in milliseconds.
Integer. The position on the progress bar in milliseconds.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
